channel.title: Vue on Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Vue on Tutorials

item.title: Build a web app with Vue
item.description: How to build a web app with Vue, Vuetify and Axios Source: Introduction In this article, we will be building a Vue.js Application supported by Vuetify and Axios. The aim of this article is to implement a movie application which will be calling on an API. The user will be able to search for movies. The API will retrieve movies with all the search details. When a user clicks on a movie, it will give more details of each movie.
